column2:
"Hmph, you sure are raring to go, aren't you?
But since you're such a loser, I imagine your
weapons aren't all that impressive."
"The Darkers are crawling forth in swarms, so it'll be dangerous if you don't take it seriously."

"I'll be watching to see how effectively you
lure those awful creatures to you. Hopefully
they're attracted to losers."
